definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Sepals oblong or linear, erect or spreading, base of lateral pair saccate .
sentences.chinese: 萼片長圓形或線形，直立或開展，基於側配對。

sentences.english: All entries should be no longer than 3 minutes and in English.
sentences.chinese: 參賽短片必須以英語進行，片長不得超過3分鐘。

sentences.english: Sepals oblong, erect, glabrous or pubescent, base of lateral pair not saccate .
sentences.chinese: 萼片長圓形，直立，無毛或被短柔毛，基部側對不。

sentences.english: How long did the film last yesterday?
sentences.chinese: 昨天這部電影片長多少？

sentences.english: Learn how to estimate the length of Christmas tree lights in this free holiday video.
sentences.chinese: 學習如何估算在這個自由的聖誕假期影片長度樹燈。

pinyin: Ao4 si1 ka3 jin1 xiang4 jiang3

definition: RMS Titanic, British passenger liner that sank in 1912 (Tw)/PRC equivalent: 泰坦尼克號|泰坦尼克号[Tai4 tan3 ni2 ke4 Hao4]

pinyin: Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 zhou1
